dialogue.text: The spiral taught me that arriving is just another form of departing. Every answer births new questions.

psychological_notes: Deep integration of spiral teachingâ€”understanding that psychological development is endless journey rather than destination. Each insight opens new territories of inquiry. This represents mature acceptance of growth as continuous process.
philosophical_underpinning: Knowledge as endless opening rather than closure
therapeutic_direction: Acceptance of therapy/growth as ongoing rather than completable
